meanings.sent1: You shouldest eat your vegetables for good health.
meanings.sent2: I shouldest study for my exam tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: If you shouldest forget your umbrella, you might get wet in the rain.
meanings.sent4: His advice shouldest be taken seriously, like a guiding light in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The warning sign shouldest be heeded to avoid danger.
